input.sentences: last week | we had a family reunion .
everyone who could came over to my house .
everybody made sure to have their pictures taken .
we never knew when we would see each other together again .
output.sentences: Kim and John enjoyed the week of their family reunion.
It was at the house of John's brother Ralph and his wife Stephanie.
Their grandparents had a wonderful time as well.
Pictures of all the cousins were taken.
Everyone had a good time and reconnected to much of the extended family.
